item.title: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce wearing Ralph Lauren in engagement photo could prove positive catalyst for stock, Jefferies says
item.description: One analyst called the engagement "mission success" for the apparel maker.

item.title: Using options to trade this pharma name that has multiple tailwinds in its favor
item.description: Options trader Tony Zhang breaks down this call vertical trade on a pharma stock.

item.title: JPMorgan downgrades Krispy Kreme to underweight, says proposed turnaround plan won’t save it from ‘survivor mode’
item.description: JPMorgan said Krispy Kreme may be overestimating its product demand when in reality, its brand novelty has diminished.

item.title: HBSC upgrades Arc'teryx jacket maker to a buy rating, citing a new leg of growth
item.description: HSBC sees shares of Amer Sports rallying nearly 23% going forward.

item.title: CoreWeave will rally more than 25% from here thanks to AI, says Cantor Fitzgerald
item.description: The investment firm initiated coverage of the cloud computing company at an overweight rating.
